name: Living Dragon Armor
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ A piece of Tarasque ( ie : #L "Piece of Living Dragon Wing" "158894" ) #L "Programmed Photon Particle Emitter (Shape Soft Armor)" "162222" #L "Mass Relocating Robot" "155592" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Programmed Photon Particle Emitter (Shape Soft Armor) + Mass Relocating Robot = #L "Mass Relocating Robot (Shape Soft Armor)" "162218" Skills: | 2.5EE,2.5ME,2.5NP | ------------------------------ A piece of Tarasque + Mass Relocating Robot (Shape Soft Armor) = A piece of Living Dragon Armor ( ie : #L "Living Dragonflesh Body Armor" "158791" ) Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Details ------------------------------ #L "Chunk of Living Dragon Flesh" "158892" -> #L "Living Dragonflesh Body Armor" "158791" ------------------------------ #L "Lump of Living Dragon Marrow" "158895" -> #L "Living Dragonmarrow Feet Armor" "158794" ------------------------------ #L "Patch of Living Dragon Skin" "158893" -> #L "Living Dragonskin Legs Armor" "158793" ------------------------------ #L "Piece of Living Dragon Wing" "158894" -> #L "Living Dragonskull Circlet" "158799" ------------------------------ #L "Shard of Living Dragon Skull" "158896" -> #L "Living Dragonwing Arms Armor" "158792" ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ The biggest armor of this game(??)... Nothing more to add except that the spawn is 9h, extremely camped and in PVP zone. Sugar on the top, the PPPE is extremely rare...
